name: Choke (itch)
description:
With minimal gameplay and neat graphics, it was made with Unity as an attempt to get the most out of an old deprecated asset package.

It is meant to create an immersive narrative experience in a polished environment.

I hope you like it!

THIRD EDIT : Redid the character controller as some people seemed to get a bit stuck on walls. Also fixed a few text bugs as well (one that was cropped, one with a typo).

SECOND EDIT : Fixed a bug that broke the main puzzle, I'm very sorry for those who encountered it!

EDIT : Slight update to the game, added a menu (press escape during the game) that allow you to restart the game and quit. Also the game won't autosave your location anymore.
